name: Fibonacci Math Puzzle
description:
Swipe to move tiles. Tiles with consecutive Fibonacci numbers will merge. Learn Fibonacci series in a fun way.

To win in 2548 Fibonacci you need to get to 2548 tile.
Fibonacci series: 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21 ..... 2584. (you can continue up to 832040 tile).


HINT: you can play in parallel a CUSTOM and a CLASSIC game. Both games will be stored and available for resume ;)
